item.title: Network Analysis with Social Media (Weibo)
item.description: I worked with Professor Mason Porter from UCLA’s Math Department on social network analysis, where I modeled a network to examine online community sentiment and behaviors (45k+ posts) under COVID lockdown. After extracting posts through requests and API, I conducted EDA and modeled the network using NetworkX. To examine users’ sentiments, I developed a deep learning sentiment analysis model for Mandarin Chinese text and achieved an 80+% accuracy. Check out my research proposal here or take a peek at my code base here.
